last_episode_to_air.name: It's Time to Post a Picture
last_episode_to_air.overview: JoJo has drawn a picture to show Great Gran Gran over a video call, but just as she’s about to show it, the internet goes down! Gran Gran suggests they post JoJo’s picture to Great Gran Gran in Saint Lucia. JoJo learns why a letter takes such a long time to travel halfway across the world.

name: JoJo & Gran Gran
overview: JoJo is almost five, and Gran Gran is her wise and loving grandmother. They live close to each other, and Gran Gran always has something fun planned to do when JoJo comes to visit.
